summary: Replaces Linwe\'s armor with savage, barbaric leather.
descriptionHtml:
Update 2.0 - The female body is now gap-free.  I\'ve also uploaded the FULL set of meshes and textures for the entire Linwe Armor set for your piece-by-piece editing convenience.  I\'ve tweaked the textures to my final liking - Dark, rough black with a tiny tinge of brown in the sun for worn realism.  Now also replaces the Linwe Hood with the warlock hood.  

If you like the daggers in the screenshots, head on over to my new mod - Gil Hibben Dagger Replacements.  URL at the bottom of this page.  Enjoy!

UPDATED - Someone mentioned a kilt.  Meh, why not.  The second download has both standalone versions.  There\'s one with justa  kilt, and another with fur + kilt.

UPDATED -  Dark female version added.  This is FAR from perfect.  The shape of the armor and female meshes in the game are not optimal for doing this type of transparency work, but I did my best.  Hope you enjoy!


This is a bit of work with the mesh and textures for linwe\'s armor (also applies to the few thieves guild guys wearing the linwe armor model).  It removes the entire \"shirt\" from the armor, leaving you with leather straps, pouches, and a shoulder dagger like Karliah, whom i was ready to murder to steal it from!

Simply unzip, place the meshes and textures in your data folder.  The armor in game is Linwe\'s Armor!  This replaces Linwe\'s armor!  Yes.  If you want a version without the dagger for either the male or female, use the meshes files in the NOSHOULDERDAGGER folder provided.



Other Mods:
Ancient Nord Armor First Person Fix - http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2808
Gil Hibben Dagger Replacements - http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4950
Linwe Armor First Person Fix - http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1956
Spartan Armor Resource - http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2198
author: Solidus2845
